menu_item.menu_item_name: Henry Weinhard’s Root Beer or Orange Cream Float
menu_item.menu_item_description: A fantastic combination of our premium bourbon vanilla ice cream and Henry Weinhard’s Premium Draught Style Root Beer or Orange Cream Soda.
IZZE sparkling apple juice, cranberry juice and fresh lime wedges, muddled together for a light, refreshing beverage sensation.
Fresh orange juice, Hawaiian pineapple juice and strawberries mixed with lemon, lime and coconut crème to bring a tropical sensation to your taste buds.
Red Bull power energy drink, fresh raspberries and a splash of simple syrup, muddled with ice and served in a martini glass for Seattle’s power players.

This famous king of all kings is simply basted with lemon, vermouth and garlic and grilled over mesquite to impart a subtle, sweet and smoky flavor. Served with four grain pilaf, grilled Washington asparagus and tomato salad and topped with artichoke tartar.
A soft baguette piled high with salami, pepperoni, coppa, black forest ham, provolone, pepperoncini, roasted red pepper, black olives, sliced red onion, organic mixed greens and saffron aïoli.
Halibut cheeks crusted with macadamia nuts and Parmesan cheese. Flash seared golden and served with Cabernet reduction, butter sauce, mashed potatoes and asparagus spears.
Fresh lingcod dipped in Redhook beer batter and crusted with Japanese bread crumbs. Served with coleslaw and housemade tartar sauce.
Alaskan weathervane scallops wrapped in prosciutto and seared golden, served with spicy bordetto sauce, orzo pasta and organic greens with balsamic vinaigrette. Topped with saffron aïoli.

menu_item.menu_item_name: MESQUITE GRILLED COPPER RIVER SEAFOOD SALAD*
menu_item.menu_item_description: Mesquite grilled Copper River sockeye salmon, black tiger prawns and fresh Dungeness crab salad tossed with organic field greens, avocado, hard–boiled egg and housemade Louie style dressing.
Marinated with lime, brown sugar, oregano, cayenne pepper and BBQ spices, grilled over mesquite and served with roasted corn mashed potatoes, avocado tomatillo salsa and lime sour cream.
Seared rare and served with avocado, fresh roma tomato and frisée. Topped with a warm sherry vinaigrette and finished with tomatillo sauce and balsamic syrup.

menu_item.menu_item_name: ALASKAN HALIBUT WITH SMOKED BACON, ASPARAGUS AND MOREL MUSHROOMS
menu_item.menu_item_description: Fresh halibut filet pan seared golden and served with garlic mashed potatoes, local asparagus spears, morel mushrooms and brunoise vegetable ragoût. Finished with truffled basil pesto.

menu_item.menu_item_name: PEPPERCORN CRUSTED BLUE CHEESE AND BACON KOBE BURGER*
menu_item.menu_item_description: Half pound Kobe burger crusted with cracked black peppercorns and grilled over mesquite. Topped with Oregon blue cheese and crispy bacon. Served on a corn kaiser roll with diamond cut fries.

A selection of our daily fresh fish marinated in lime, soy and chili garlic paste. Grilled over mesquite and served with warm flour tortillas, iceberg lettuce, tomato, basil, Monterey Jack and Thai sweet chili sauce.

This famous king of all kings known for its unmistakable rich and full flavor is simply basted with lemon, vermouth and garlic and grilled over mesquite. Served with artichoke tartar. | Filet* and Copper River King Salmon Combination

menu_item.menu_item_description: Flourless chocolate cake with eggs, butter, sugar and bittersweet chocolate. Filled with housemade caramel and milk chocolate ganache. Served warm with chantilly cream.

menu_item.menu_item_name: Olympic Mountain Ice Cream or Sorbet
menu_item.menu_item_description: Olympic Mountain Creamery uses only the freshest ingredients and rich cream to custom make the velvety smooth flavors for the Metropolitan Grill. Served in an almond florentine cup. Ask your server for today’s selection.
Three layers of rich, dense yellow cake, toasted coconut and white chocolate chips. Frosted with a rich white chocolate icing and served with raspberry coulis.
Layers of rich, moist devil’s food chocolate caked filled with chocolate butter cream. Served with Olympic Mountain Madagascar vanilla ice cream and a special dark chocolate sauce.
Granny Smith apples sautéed with brown sugar, butter, cinnamon and cloves. Flambéed tableside and served with Madagascar vanilla ice cream and caramel.
A classic. Bananas sautéed with butter, brown sugar and Myers’s Original Spiced rum. Flambéed tableside and served with Madagascar vanilla ice cream and caramel.
Bing cherries sautéed with butter, brown sugar, Chambord liqueur and brandy. Flambéed tableside and served with Madagascar vanilla ice cream.
